Sentence 1: Vascular resistance is determined by several factors, each playing a crucial role in regulating blood pressure
Sentence 2: One key factor is the length and diameter of blood vessels, with smaller, narrower vessels increasing resistance

Sentence 2: Vascular smooth muscle tone is critical; contraction increases resistance while relaxation decreases it
